channel.title: Dying players not indicated as dead on player list
channel.description:
#### What happened: As the game went on and players were killed, some started talking in Graveyard chat but were still showing up as alive. I assumed this was a reaper but it happened to two players in one night. There was also no reaper in the game.
#### What was supposed to happen: Dead players indicated in red.
#### Steps to reproduce: No clue
#### Comments: Apparently I can't upload an attachment can I post the log somewhere?
